definitions.body: Pf. 1 S. ´[[נַ֫פְתִּי מִשְׁכָּבִי מׂר וגו]] Pr 7:17 I have besprinkled my couch with myrrh, etc.

definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. ´[[יְנׁפֵף יׇדוֹ הַר וגו]] Is 10:32 he brandisheth his hand toward the mt. (on acc. [[הַר]] cf. Ges :§ 118 f. Da:Synt. § 69, R 2).

wield, move tool to and fro in using it, c. [[עַל־]] of material: [[כִּי חֵרְבְּ ְהֵנַפְתָּ עָלֶיהָ]] Ex 20:25 (E), i.e. over stone, so De 27:5, Jos 8:31 (D), and De 23:26 a sickle thou shalt not wield over the standing grain of thy neighbour; abs. [[מְנִיפוֹ]] Is 10:15 against him that wieldeth it(i.e. a saw), and [[כְּהָנִיף שֵׁבֶט]] [[וְאֶת־מְרִימוֹ]] v:Is 10:15 (rd. [[אֶת־]]) like a rod's wielding him that lifteth it.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: wave hand [[אֶל־הַמָּקוֹם]] 2Ki 5:11, in healing ceremony (i.e. prob. toward sanctuary Kmp:Kau; > toward the spot [where leprosy appears], so most).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: c. [[עַל־]], shake or brandish against, Is 11:15, Is 19:16, Zec 2:13 (all of ´[[י]]) Job 31:21 [cf. Sir 12:18 (without [[עַל]]) in mockery].

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: wave hand, as a signal, Is 13:2.
swing to and fro [[בְּנׇפַת]],in a sieve, Is 30:28 (fig., of nations).

Oft. term. techn. in P (H), of rite in which orig.ly the priest lifted his share of offering and waved it, i.e. moved it toward altar and back, in token of its presentation to God and its return by him to priest: in H, ´[[וְהֵנִיף אֶת־הָעׂמֶר לִפְנֵי י]] Le 23:11 cf. v:Le 23:11; v:Le 23:12, also v:Le 23:20 (on text v. Di Dr-Wh:Hpt) ; in P, [[וְהֵנַפְתָּ֫ אׂתוֹ]] ´[[תְּנוּפָה לִפְנֵי י]] Ex 29:26, so Le 7:30, Le 8:29, Le 10:15 (obj. om.) Nu 6:20; thus also Levites are set apart for service of the priests Nu 8:11 (Di del. v.), v:Nu 8:13, v:Nu 8:21, cf. v:l4 (´[[לִפְנֵי י]] om.); but same phr, of entire lamb, with oil, Le 14:12, Le 14:24, and of offerings wh. were burnt, entirely Ex 29:24 (cf. v:Ex 29:25), Le 8:27 (cf. v:Le 8:28), or in part Nu 5:25 (´[[הֵנִיף הַמִּנְחָה לִפְנֵי י]]),—in these the orig. signif. seems lost; so, clearly, of contributions for tabernacle, = offer ´[[הֵנִיף תְּנוּפַת זׇהָב לְי]] Ex 35:22.—Cf. [[תְּנוּפָה]] infr.
Shed abroad(si vera l.) [[גֶּשֶׁם נְדָבוֹת תָּנִיף]] Ps 68:10 bounteous rain thou didst shed abroad [cf. Sir 43:17], but vb. not wholly suitable; Lag Gr prop. [[תַּטִּיף]], yet this also questionable.
